title: Gazebo 10: [SensorManager.cc:295] Unable to create sensor of type[ray]

content.raw:
Tried building a Lidar scanner with type ray and got the following message,

[Err] [SensorManager.cc:295] Unable to create sensor of type[ray]

and

tried to build with <gpu_ray>
[Err] [SensorManager.cc:295] Unable to create sensor of type[gpu_ray]

background info:
Built the gazebo simulation from source
